abilities.desc: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun. Deals double damage to creeps.
abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.notes: Remains active if Clockwerk is disabled.

abilities.desc: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.
abilities.name: Power Cogs

abilities.desc: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 6.0 seconds.
abilities.name: Rocket Flare

abilities.desc: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in it\'s range; Clockwerk\'s attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.
abilities.name: Overclocking

abilities.desc: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.
abilities.name: Jetpack

abilities.desc: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage to everyone in a [175, 175, 175] radius around the hit target.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.notes: Hookshot will latch and take Clockwerk to allies, but not damage or disable them.
